context.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

per_page.description: Maximum number of items to be returned in result set.

search.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

after.description: Limit response to posts published after a given ISO8601 compliant date.

before.description: Limit response to posts published before a given ISO8601 compliant date.

exclude.description: Ensure result set excludes specific IDs.

include.description: Limit result set to specific IDs.

offset.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of items.

order.description: Order sort attribute ascending or descending.

slug.description: Limit result set to posts with one or more specific slugs.

status.description: Limit result set to items assigned one or more statuses.

ticket-tag.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the ticket-tag taxonomy.

ticket-tag_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the ticket-tag taxonomy.

product.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the product taxonomy.

product_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the product taxonomy.

department.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the department taxonomy.

department_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the department taxonomy.

ticket_priority.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the ticket_priority taxonomy.

ticket_priority_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the ticket_priority taxonomy.

ticket_channel.description: Limit result set to all items that have the specified term assigned in the ticket_channel taxonomy.

ticket_channel_exclude.description: Limit result set to all items except those that have the specified term assigned in the ticket_channel taxonomy.

state.description: Limit result set to tickets in the specified state.

author.default: The ID of the current logged in client if applicable.
author.description: The ID for the author of the object.

assignee.default: The ID of the current logged in agent if applicable.
assignee.description: The agent assigned to this ticket

date.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

date_gmt.description: The date the object was published, as GMT.

slug.description: An alphanumeric identifier for the object unique to its type.

status.description: A named status for the object.

ticket-tag.description: The terms assigned to the object in the ticket-tag taxonomy.

product.description: The terms assigned to the object in the product taxonomy.

department.description: The terms assigned to the object in the department taxonomy.

ticket_priority.description: The terms assigned to the object in the ticket_priority taxonomy.

ticket_channel.description: The terms assigned to the object in the ticket_channel taxonomy.

state.description: Limit result set to tickets in the specified state.

author.description: The ID for the author of the object.

assignee.description: The agent assigned to this ticket

secondary-assignee.description: The secondary assignee for this ticket

tertiary-assignee.description: The tertiary assignee for this ticket

customer-reply-count.description: The number of customer replies to this ticket

agent-reply-count.description: The number of agent replies to this ticket

total-reply-count.description: The number of total replies to this ticket

time-calculated.description: The gross time calculated for ticket in minutes

time-adjustments.description: The time adjustments for ticket in minutes

time-adjustments-type.description: The type of time adjustment, positive or negative.
